title: Black Screen After Pressing Launch Button
body: I recently built a PC and was running League of Legends without issues until recently when I encountered a black screen after hitting the launch button. I have repaired the game 3 times, as well as reinstalling and checking the permissions. Is there another resolution to this problem? I know that it is a common issue that has been solved before, but I have scoured the boards for similar posts without a fix for my own client. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: I fixed it! I did a repair install using the Windows 10 Installation Disk and reinstalled the game.
Didn't have any luck with that.
Would love to know if you fix this problem and how as I am having the same issue.

Your network is trying to establish a connection to the server but failing, which is resulting in the black screen you're seeing.  Repairing the game would fix up game files and not your connection, so it wouldn't necessarily resolve this issue.  I recommend checking out our [troubleshooting connections](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this problem.  Let me know if you have any issues afterward!
